name: cluster
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Uses FSL cluster to perform clustering on statistical output

inputs.name: Connectivity
inputs.description: The connectivity of voxels (default 26).

inputs.name: Cope file
inputs.description: Cope volume.

inputs.name: Dlh
inputs.description: Smoothness estimate = sqrt(det(lambda)).

inputs.name: Find min
inputs.description: Find minima instead of maxima.

inputs.name: Fractional
inputs.description: Interprets the threshold as a fraction of the robust range.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: Input volume.

inputs.name: Minclustersize
inputs.description: Prints out minimum significant cluster size.

inputs.name: No table
inputs.description: Suppresses printing of the table info.

inputs.name: Num maxima
inputs.description: No of local maxima to report.

inputs.name: Out index file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Output of cluster index (in size order).

inputs.name: Out index file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Output of cluster index (in size order).

inputs.name: Out localmax txt file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Local maxima text file.

inputs.name: Out localmax txt file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Local maxima text file.

inputs.name: Out localmax vol file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Output of local maxima volume.

inputs.name: Out localmax vol file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Output of local maxima volume.

inputs.name: Out max file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Filename for output of max image.

inputs.name: Out max file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Filename for output of max image.

inputs.name: Out mean file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Filename for output of mean image.

inputs.name: Out mean file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Filename for output of mean image.

inputs.name: Out pval file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Filename for image output of log pvals.

inputs.name: Out pval file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Filename for image output of log pvals.

inputs.name: Out size file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Filename for output of size image.

inputs.name: Out size file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Filename for output of size image.

inputs.name: Out threshold file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Thresholded image.

inputs.name: Out threshold file
inputs.description: A boolean or file. Thresholded image.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti' or 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti_pair_gz'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Peak distance
inputs.description: Minimum distance between local maxima/minima, in mm (default 0).

inputs.name: Pthreshold
inputs.description: P-threshold for clusters.

inputs.name: Std space file
inputs.description: Filename for standard-space volume.

inputs.name: Threshold
inputs.description: Threshold for input volume.

inputs.name: Use mm
inputs.description: Use mm, not voxel, coordinates.

inputs.name: Volume
inputs.description: Number of voxels in the mask.

inputs.name: Warpfield file
inputs.description: File containing warpfield.

inputs.name: Xfm file
inputs.description: Filename for linear: input->standard-space transform. non-linear: input->highres transform.

output-files.name: Index file
output-files.description: Output of cluster index (in size order).

output-files.name: Max file
output-files.description: Filename for output of max image.

output-files.name: Mean file
output-files.description: Filename for output of mean image.

output-files.name: Pval file
output-files.description: Filename for image output of log pvals.

output-files.name: Size file
output-files.description: Filename for output of size image.
